path: artifacts/Secured MoonRat Token Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.SecuredMoonRat: contracts/Secured MoonRat Token Smart Contract Security Audit/SecuredMoonRat

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can lead to OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if there is a long excluded addresses list.
